message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its high value and quality, I am confident it will be worth every penny to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special price of $11,000. This is a unique chance to acquire an item that could significantly enhance your business or personal projects. I look forward to your positive response.
